2020 Annual Impact Report for the Blackhorn Ventures Industrial Impact Fund, LP

It is with great pride and pleasure that we share the inaugural 2020 Annual Impact Report for the Blackhorn Ventures Industrial Impact Fund, LP. We are humbled to partner with all of the companies included in this report, as each has made invaluable contributions towards addressing IIF’s social and environmental impact objectives.

We are deeply appreciative of each company’s contributions in the unique context and circumstances of the world today. The effects of climate change are growing increasingly apparent in our daily lives, and the impact of the global COVID-19 pandemic continues to unfold and ripple throughout the global economy. At Blackhorn, we’re focused on investing in timely solutions that improve resource efficiency and resiliency in industrial sectors. We think this is both the greatest value creation opportunity of our time and the best way to address climate change – a perspective well-supported by the companies profiled in this report.

 

Download the report by clicking on this link or on the image above.

Based in Colorado. Click here to learn why

Privacy Policy  |  GDPR Compliance
